name: Extended Stay America - Newark - Christiana - Wilmington

reviews.text: I have been staying at this hotel for about nine months now, and will be here until March of 2013. I must say that Diane and Cheryl, make me feel right at home. The staff is great, and the rooms clean. I will recommend this hotel to friends and family.
reviews.title: Great experience at the Hotel

reviews.text: clean,quiet and excellent front desk help. never an issue .
reviews.title: Have stayed here over 20 times without an issue

reviews.text: Price is right,location off 95 is perfect. This is a place where you can come on business or take your family.
reviews.title: Location is superb as is the staff !

reviews.text: 5 minutes from Christiana mall and a few miles from Wilmington
reviews.title: Clean and convenient.

reviews.text: Location is very easy to locate and staff is amazing, everyone who is working there is very knowledgeable with the area and are just pleasant and helpful. Rooms are very nice and clean, large space for you to get work done or even have a meeting in the room if necessary. Hotel wifi is a bit sluggish being the only downfall. But clean rooms and great rates win out !
reviews.title: Pleasantly suprised

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I recently spent a night here after Orbitz failed to confirm a reservation at another area hotel. It was graduation weekend, so rooms were hard to come buy. Orbitz was able to get us a room here as a replacement for the messed up reservation.
reviews.title: Ants!

reviews.text: When we first arrived, we just left our bags and headed to dinner, so didn't get a good look at the room, but from what we saw, it seemed fine. When we returned from dinner and were settling in, I noticed ant crawling all over the kitchen area counter. Then I noticed the same in the bathroom.
reviews.title: King suite was worth ten extra bucks very clean
Not clean
reviews.text: From that point on, we just could not get comfortable. The front desk offered to spray the next day (which was useless to us, since we were leaving). Needless to say neither of us slept well. We were glad to leave the next morning.
It did included a so-called breakfast, which basically consisted of instant oatmeal and chewy granola bars. The coffee was acceptable (probably the best thing the hotel had to offer).
reviews.title: I didn't like my stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very clean offers different rates depending on how long ur stay strongly advise anyone to get king suite with sofa bed it was roomy like a little apt BBQ grill nice laundry room only complaint no pool or gym considering the average stay is week plus they don't offer member club that offerspoints for loyal customers free nights but they have added a small breakfast in am its new
reviews.title: i would not give it one star if i did not have to

reviews.text: My stay at Extended Stay America - Newark/Christiana was excellent, with a warm atmosphere and really great for family or business clients.
reviews.title: Great Experience at Extended Stay America - Newark

reviews.text: The staff interaction with guest seems to be unique because they really extend that olive branch to help you by either providing valuable area information to assisting us with hotel services. Just want to highlight extremely positive experiences that I was exposed to during my visit. Most of my experiences are my interaction with hotel manager Diane, Rowena, Cheryl and Chrissi. These individuals always take an extra step to ensure that I am having a possible experience during my stay.
reviews.title: Enjoying My Extended Stay at Extended Stay America Newark

reviews.text: Since my positive experiences at my last stay at Extended Stay I have shared these positive experiences with family, friends and business customers.
reviews.title: I Am Enjoying My Stay

reviews.text: I've been booked by my company at this hotel last November 2012 when I was on assignment. I chose to be booked again at this hotel when I got back from my vacation over the Christmas holidays. The main reasons I chose this hotel are: 1) They have very excellent, accommodating and trustworthy manager and staff. They've helped me in any way they can from little things (like operating the laundry machines) to to big things (such as sending my very important fedex mail and keeping my paychecks when I was on vacation). With this, I'd like to commend and thank Rowena, Dianne, Cheryl, the other Cheryl (or Sheryl?) and Chrissi. I'd also like to thank Rowena for helping me when I was lost in Wilmington. 2) They got clean rooms and a comfortable bed. 3) The hotel staff and the room ambiance makes you feel at home. 4) The location is near the office and the mall.
reviews.title: Excellent experience at ESA-Newark-Christiana

reviews.text: I'd just like to suggest to them to put up a gym. But overall, I'm having a great stay at the hotel.
reviews.title: Travel for Business more like Pleasure

reviews.text: This hotel seems to cater to smokers. I reserved a non-smoking room and was given
reviews.title: Don't stay here if you aren't a smoker

reviews.text: a smoking room. When I complained, I was told they hadn't had any non-smoking rooms
reviews.title: This is an excellent hotel to stay in

reviews.text: available for the night we reserved for at least a month prior to my request. They claimed
reviews.title: Jimmy H

reviews.text: that it was the company we reserved through (Hotels.com) who made the reservation knowing
reviews.title: Run away now!

reviews.text: there was not a room available to meet our request. I've reviewed Hotels.com separately.
reviews.title: My family was in a crisis---staff-sympathtic/empathetic-helpful--thanks
